commentary_text: The referee of today's match will be Clement Turpin.
The players are out and the match is about to start. England will have the kick-off.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!
A short through ball almost allows Phil Foden (England) to get in a good shooting position, but he loses it to one of the defenders.
Conor Gallagher (England) was too forceful with his tackle and Clement Turpin interrupted the game to signal a free kick.

Benjamin Sesko (Slovenia) is strong enough to get to the ball and produces a header from close range. Even though it was aimed precisely towards the middle of the goal, Jordan Pickford didn't have a hard time stopping the attempt as it wasn't powerful enough.
England players are exchanging short passes with one another, waiting for the right moment to beat the opposition's defence.
The ball is cleared after Harry Kane (England) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
Phil Foden (England) is offside and the linesman raises his flag.
Andraz Sporar (Slovenia) wastes a good opportunity as his pass into the box is blocked by the defence.
Here's the current ball possession statistics for both teams - 71:29.
Erik Janza (Slovenia) attempted to create a dangerous situation in front of goal by sending a cross into the box, but the defence easily dealt with the threat.
Bukayo Saka (England) dinks a cross into the box in an attempt to find one of his teammates, but the defence manages to clear.
Andraz Sporar (Slovenia) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.
Clement Turpin shows a yellow card to Kieran Trippier (England) for his blatant foul.
Clement Turpin has a clear sight and sees a foul from Conor Gallagher (England).
Erik Janza (Slovenia) sends in a lofted cross from a mid-range free kick. His effort, however, goes out of play.
A neat pass is well received by Andraz Sporar (Slovenia), who is lurking on the edge of the box and strikes the ball on goal. The goalkeeper makes a decent save to block his shot.
A goal, which was scored by Bukayo Saka (England), was disallowed due to offside.
Clement Turpin couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Kyle Walker (England) and blew his whistle.
It must be a yellow card. It is. Erik Janza (Slovenia) receives the caution after an awful tackle.
Erik Janza (Slovenia) will miss the next game because of that yellow card.
Jude Bellingham (England) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders.
Jan Mlakar (Slovenia) commits a rough challenge and Clement Turpin blows his whistle for a foul.
Phil Foden (England) plays a through ball but overhits it.
Harry Kane (England) receives a good pass and from just outside the box he unleashes a promising strike, but the shot is blocked by the defender.
A cross into the box from Phil Foden (England) is cleared.
Kieran Trippier (England) is heading toward the corner flag to take the set piece.
A snap shot by Harry Kane (England) from mid-range towards the middle of the goal catches Jan Oblak flat footed, but he somehow recovers and makes a brilliant save.
Andraz Sporar (Slovenia) receives a pass and fires a shot in from long range, but it's blocked.
Dangerous play by Jaka Bijol (Slovenia). Clement Turpin blows his whistle for a foul.
Phil Foden (England) fires the ball from the free kick, directing it towards the top left corner, but the goalkeeper stretches to punch the ball away. What an excellent save.
A pass into the penalty area from Zan Karnicnik (Slovenia) is intercepted by the defence.
Slovenia keep possession of the ball with some short passes, waiting for the moment to hit the opposition swiftly on the break.
Clement Turpin blows his whistle and it's Jaka Bijol (Slovenia) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.
Kieran Trippier (England) clips an inviting cross into the box, but there's no one in a position to get on the end of it.
The corner from Kieran Trippier (England) is hurriedly cleared.
Declan Rice (England) fouls an opponent during an attacking move.
Clement Turpin blows his whistle to signal the end of the first-half action.
The second half has just started.
There will be a change on the pitch for the second half. Gareth Southgate probably wasn't satisfied with the performance of Conor Gallagher. He is replaced by Kobbie Mainoo (England).
Some neat passing and movement from England as they ping around some short passes in order to create a new attacking opportunity.
Jude Bellingham (England) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
Kieran Trippier (England) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.
Harry Kane (England) tries to send the ball in front of the goal, but the opposition's defence averts the threat.
Kieran Trippier (England) goes over to take a corner kick after one of the defenders makes a good clearance.

Phil Foden (England) has a snap shot at goal from distance after a rebound falls his way, but the effort is wild and flies miles wide of the right post. The ball goes out of play and Slovenia will have a goal kick.
Kyle Walker (England) sends over a cross, but he can't find any teammate inside the box. Poor delivery.
The attendance is 41536.
A lofted cross from Jude Bellingham (England) is unsuccessful as the opponent's defence quickly clears the ball out of the penalty area.
Vanja Drkusic (Slovenia) commits a rough foul. Clement Turpin stops the game and makes a call.
The free kick from long range, taken by England, is intercepted by one of the defenders.
Bukayo Saka (England) sends the ball into the box from the side of the pitch, but his cross is blocked.
Phil Foden (England) will take a corner kick.

John Stones (England) rose high to meet a perfectly taken corner kick and attempted to steer a fine header from inside the box towards the left side of the goal. Nobody knows what would have happened if one of the defending players hadn't pulled off a brilliant intervention to block the effort.
The foul by Bukayo Saka (England) was seen by Clement Turpin who didn't hesitate to blow the whistle.
The cross into the penalty area from Kobbie Mainoo (England) needed to be more accurate in order to create a goal-scoring opportunity for his team.
Kyle Walker (England) skips past his man but can't keep the ball in play.
Bukayo Saka (England) commits a foul after unfairly battling his opponent for the ball.
There's a distinct lack of options for Adam Gnezda Cerin (Slovenia), so he drills a shot from long range that curls well wide of the left post.
The percentage of ball possession is - 75:25.
Marc Guehi (England) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Clement Turpin had an easy-decision to make.
Erik Janza (Slovenia) sends in a cross from a long-range free kick. However, his effort lacks accuracy and the ball sails off the pitch.
The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Cole Palmer (England) is coming onto the pitch as Bukayo Saka cannot continue after picking up an injury.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Jaka Bijol (Slovenia) was quite harsh and Clement Turpin didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Kieran Trippier (England) takes the ball and sets it for the free kick.
Declan Rice (England) controls a poor pass, breaks past an opponent then slices an effort from mid-range well wide of the right post.
Benjamin Sesko comes off the pitch to be replaced by Josip Ilicic (Slovenia).
Kobbie Mainoo (England) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
Declan Rice (England) commits a rough challenge and Clement Turpin blows his whistle for an infringement.
The referee shows a yellow card to Phil Foden (England). No wonder. A clear yellow for bad language.
Phil Foden (England) will try to find the head of one of his teammates from a corner kick.
Harry Kane (England) commits a foul and Clement Turpin immediately signals a free kick.
Cole Palmer (England) crosses into the box from near the side line, but he doesn't connect as he wanted and it's cleared by the well-organized defence.
Phil Foden (England) collects a pass and finds himself in a good position to strike from the edge of the box, but his attempt is blocked.
A cross from Cole Palmer (England) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety.
Cole Palmer (England) should know this behaviour is beyond the rules. He was too careless with his challenge and left Clement Turpin no option but to blow his whistle.
Here's the change. Kieran Trippier leaves the pitch and Trent Alexander-Arnold (England) comes on as a substitute.
Josip Ilicic (Slovenia) makes a rough challenge and the referee blows for a foul.
Matjaz Kek has decided to substitute Jan Mlakar and he is replaced by Jon Gorenc Stankovic (Slovenia).
Matjaz Kek has decided to make a change. Zan Celar (Slovenia) replaces Andraz Sporar.
It looks like Erik Janza (Slovenia) saw red with that tackle. Clement Turpin won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.
Phil Foden (England) takes the free kick but it is cleared by the first defender.
Kobbie Mainoo (England) makes a strong challenge and Clement Turpin blows for a foul.
Today's match ends for Phil Foden who will be replaced by Anthony Gordon (England).
4 additional min. will be played.
Matjaz Kek prepares a substitution. Erik Janza is replaced by Jure Balkovec (Slovenia).

Cole Palmer (England) beats a couple of players and hammers in a low shot from mid-range towards the middle of the goal. The keeper is caught unaware but still pulls off a great save to deny the effort.
Trent Alexander-Arnold (England) collects a pass, sees the keeper off his line and shoots from long range, but the effort is disappointing and goes high over the bar.
Clement Turpin is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
